title: Yemeni unification
summary: Yemeni unification (Arabic: الوحدة اليمنية‎, romanized: al-waḥda al-Yamaniyya) took place on May 22, 1990, when the area of the People's Democratic Republic of Yemen (also known as South Yemen) was united with the Yemen Arab Republic (also known as North Yemen), forming the Republic of Yemen (known as simply Yemen).
